channel.title: Saving Changes
channel.description:
Is there something I can put into some code that saves EVERY thing that I change?
Like, I changed all the Oak Trees to Magic trees and signs into bank booths, but after I closed the client, all of it got reset.
How do I fix make all my changes permanent unless I manually change them again?

item.title: Saving Changes
item.dc:creator: @Sarevoke75 Sarevoke75
